title: Problem with Dreadknight Garen skin
body: I have a problem with Dreadknight Garen. I have this free code but when I want to get him, an error appears.

replies.body: We gotchu fam! Sometimes those codes seem to break, but if you check your collection you should have Dreadknight Garen now ^_^

I also have the same problem with getting the dreadknight garen skin, could that be fixed too? also, when I try o get riot girl tristana on facebook, I get a message that says the skin will be back shortly, but it's been months and it's still not available, will she ever be back?

Same probl√©m, check the screens

Hope you will be able to help me soon{summoner:6}}
